brand.name: Otherwhere
brand.tagline: AI travel concierge: text or call to get curated trip options and booking help.

snippets.short: Otherwhere: AI travel concierge. Text to get curated trips + booking help.
snippets.medium: Otherwhere is an AI travel concierge: text or call to get curated trip options and booking help. Built for busy people who want recommendations, not endless search results.
snippets.full: Otherwhere is an AI-powered travel concierge where you text or call to get personalized trip recommendations and booking assistance. Unlike generic AI chatbots, Otherwhere searches real inventory, curates a shortlist based on your preferences, and helps you actually book. Built for busy professionals who value time over money and want expert curation without the research.

pillars.name: The ChatGPT Travel Problem
pillars.angle: ChatGPT is great for brainstorming but can't book, verify prices, or remember you. Purpose-built travel AI can.

pillars.name: The Paradox of Choice
pillars.angle: Travel has too many options. More choice = more stress. You need curation, not search results.

pillars.name: The New Concierge
pillars.angle: AI + human curation = the modern travel concierge. Text-first, no apps, no searching.

pillars.name: Time Over Money
pillars.angle: For people who have money but not time, the math changes. Your time is worth more than the 'savings' from 3 hours of research.

pillars.name: Curated, Not Comprehensive
pillars.angle: Not '50 hotels in Paris' but 'The 3 hotels in Paris for different types of travelers.' Opinionated, specific, useful.

pillars.name: Understated Luxury
pillars.angle: Luxury isn't marble lobbies and gold leaf. It's the quiet wine bar the concierge knows.

skip-the-prompts.headline: Skip the Prompts
skip-the-prompts.body: Tired of crafting the perfect prompt? Text TRAVEL to +1 (323) 922-4067 and get personalized recommendations in minutes.

try-otherwhere.headline: Ready to Plan Your Trip?
try-otherwhere.body: Text TRAVEL to +1 (323) 922-4067 and tell us where you want to go. Our AI concierge will send you curated options within minutes.

personalized-recs.headline: Want Personalized Recommendations?
personalized-recs.body: Text TRAVEL to +1 (323) 922-4067 and tell us what you're looking for. We'll curate options based on your preferences.

stop-researching.headline: Stop Researching. Start Texting.
stop-researching.body: Your time is worth more than endless scrolling. Text TRAVEL to +1 (323) 922-4067 - we'll do the research for you.

soft-curious.headline: Curious How It Works?
soft-curious.body: Text TRAVEL to +1 (323) 922-4067 to try Otherwhere. No commitment, just a conversation.

writingGuidelines.voice: Write like a well-traveled friend, not a marketing bot. Opinionated but not snobby. Specific details over generic advice.
writingGuidelines.structure: Answer the search intent in first 100 words. Use short paragraphs (2-3 sentences). Include specific examples and numbers.
